def: The green mineral characteristic of the greensand of the chalkand other formations. It is a hydrous silicate of iron and potash.See Greensand.
Pertaining equally to the right-hand side and the left-handside. Earle.
To cite; to summon. [Obs.]Our heralds now accited all that were Endamaged by the Elians.Chapman.
To sail again; also, to sail back, as to a former port.
Stuffing, or mixture of viands, like that used on dressing afowl; forcemeat.
A weight of 1,000 kilograms, or 2,204.6 pounds avoirdupois.
Of or pertaining to the diploÃ«.
